    @allure.story("Login completo y cambio a franc√©s en un solo test")
    @allure.description("Realizar login completo y cambiar idioma a franc√©s sin cerrar el test")
    def test_login_completo_y_cambio_idioma(self, driver):
        """Caso 3: Login completo + cambio a franc√©s en un solo test"""
    
        login_page = LoginPage(driver)
    
        # === PARTE 1: LOGIN COMPLETO ===
        with allure.step("1. Navegar a la p√°gina principal"):
            driver.get("https://nuxqa3.avtest.ink/es/")
            time.sleep(3)
            print("‚úÖ P√°gina principal cargada")
    
        with allure.step("2. Tomar captura inicial"):
            allure.attach(driver.get_screenshot_as_png(), name="pagina_principal", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
    
        with allure.step("3. Hacer clic en 'Iniciar sesi√≥n'"):
            assert login_page.click_login_button(), "‚ùå Error en bot√≥n login"
            print("‚úÖ Redireccionado a p√°gina de login")
    
        with allure.step("4. Ingresar usuario"):
            assert login_page.enter_username("21734198706"), "‚ùå Error ingresando usuario"
            print("‚úÖ Usuario ingresado")
    
        with allure.step("5. Ingresar contrase√±a"):
            assert login_page.enter_password("Lifemiles1"), "‚ùå Error ingresando contrase√±a"
            print("‚úÖ Contrase√±a ingresada")
    
        with allure.step("6. Hacer clic en login del modal"):
            assert login_page.click_modal_login_button(), "‚ùå Error en bot√≥n login modal"
            print("‚úÖ Login completado")
    
        # === PARTE 2: ESPERAR Y MANEJAR REDIRECCI√ìN ===
        with allure.step("7. Esperar redirecci√≥n post-login"):
            print("üîÑ Esperando redirecci√≥n...")
            time.sleep(8)
    
            # üî• SOLUCI√ìN: Verificar estado actual del driver
            try:
                current_url = driver.current_url
                print(f"üìç URL actual: {current_url}")
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"‚ö†Ô∏è  Error obteniendo URL: {e}")
                # Si hay error, navegar directamente a la p√°gina post-login
                driver.get("https://nuxqa3.avtest.ink/es/lifemiles-info/landing-intermedia/")
                print("‚úÖ Navegado directamente a p√°gina post-login")
                time.sleep(3)
    
        with allure.step("8. Verificar que estamos logueados"):
            try:
                final_url = driver.current_url
                print(f"üìç URL final post-login: {final_url}")
    
                if "landing-intermedia" in final_url:
                    print("‚úÖ Confirmado: Estamos en p√°gina post-login")
                else:
                    print(f"‚ö†Ô∏è  Estamos en: {final_url}")
    
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"‚ö†Ô∏è  Error verificando URL: {e}")
    
        with allure.step("9. Tomar captura post-login"):
>           allure.attach(driver.get_screenshot_as_png(), name="post_login", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)

    def check_response(self, response: Dict[str, Any]) -> None:
        """Checks that a JSON response from the WebDriver does not have an
        error.
    
        :Args:
         - response - The JSON response from the WebDriver server as a dictionary
           object.
    
        :Raises: If the response contains an error message.
        """
        status = response.get("status", None)
        if not status or status == ErrorCode.SUCCESS:
            return
        value = None
        message = response.get("message", "")
        screen: str = response.get("screen", "")
        stacktrace = None
        if isinstance(status, int):
            value_json = response.get("value", None)
            if value_json and isinstance(value_json, str):
                import json
    
                try:
                    value = json.loads(value_json)
                    if len(value) == 1:
                        value = value["value"]
                    status = value.get("error", None)
                    if not status:
                        status = value.get("status", ErrorCode.UNKNOWN_ERROR)
                        message = value.get("value") or value.get("message")
                        if not isinstance(message, str):
                            value = message
                            message = message.get("message")
                    else:
                        message = value.get("message", None)
                except ValueError:
                    pass
    
        exception_class: Type[WebDriverException]
        e = ErrorCode()
        error_codes = [item for item in dir(e) if not item.startswith("__")]
        for error_code in error_codes:
            error_info = getattr(ErrorCode, error_code)
            if isinstance(error_info, list) and status in error_info:
                exception_class = getattr(ExceptionMapping, error_code, WebDriverException)
                break
        else:
            exception_class = WebDriverException
    
        if not value:
            value = response["value"]
        if isinstance(value, str):
            raise exception_class(value)
        if message == "" and "message" in value:
            message = value["message"]
    
        screen = None  # type: ignore[assignment]
        if "screen" in value:
            screen = value["screen"]
    
        stacktrace = None
        st_value = value.get("stackTrace") or value.get("stacktrace")
        if st_value:
            if isinstance(st_value, str):
                stacktrace = st_value.split("\n")
            else:
                stacktrace = []
                try:
                    for frame in st_value:
                        line = frame.get("lineNumber", "")
                        file = frame.get("fileName", "<anonymous>")
                        if line:
                            file = f"{file}:{line}"
                        meth = frame.get("methodName", "<anonymous>")
                        if "className" in frame:
                            meth = f"{frame['className']}.{meth}"
                        msg = "    at %s (%s)"
                        msg = msg % (meth, file)
                        stacktrace.append(msg)
                except TypeError:
                    pass
        if exception_class == UnexpectedAlertPresentException:
            alert_text = None
            if "data" in value:
                alert_text = value["data"].get("text")
            elif "alert" in value:
                alert_text = value["alert"].get("text")
            raise exception_class(message, screen, stacktrace, alert_text)  # type: ignore[call-arg]  # mypy is not smart enough here
